content.p: Assistant Professor, Dr Regina is an Assistant Professor at Faculty of Engineering, Engineering Foundation program. She received her Bachelor degree in Computer and Mathematical Sciences from Victoria University of Technology (Australia) and PhD in Creative Multimedia from Multimedia University (Malaysia). Regina has more than fifteen years of teaching experience in higher learning institutions. Her main research area includes multimedia learning objects in teaching and learning introductory programming language, data science, learning analytics (educational data mining) and technology support for individuals with learning disability. Software Applications and Programming Languages I am interested in pedagogy of computer science, scaffolding learning, multimedia/web applications and content management.
